description:
Exiled from civilization and the comforts of modern society, Rod Daily is alone in the woods with only his wits to keep him alive. Under such harsh circumstances, his sexual desire becomes insatiable. Among the trees, he strokes his cock and dreams of one day again feeling the warmth of a human companion.

He knows he must live in the shadows as an invisible presence, while his raging desires grow stronger, urging him to do things he knows he mustn't. When he happens upon a house, just off the woods, he enters, against his best judgment, draws a bath, and jerks his throbbing dick in the tub. From there he finds a soft, warm bed to finish himself. The luxuriousness of the fine linen reminds him of a time long ago and a life he once lived.

Enjoy!
title: Rod Daily
